izzy.classification.f1¶

izzy.classification.f1(y_true, y_pred, sample_weights=None)[source]¶

Compute the f1 score

\[f1 = \frac{2TP}{2TP + FP + FN}\]
Parameters

  • y_true (ArrayLike) – True outcomes

  • y_pred (ArrayLike) – Predicted outcomes, already classified

  • sample_weights (ArrayLike) – Weight of observations

Returns

f1 score for each class

Return type

dict

Previous topic

izzy.classification.confusion_matrix

Next topic

izzy.classification.false_negatives
